descriptionHtml:
MIGHTY BONER & DEATH SCYTHE

THESE POWERFULL WEAPONS ARE AVAILABLE VIA CONSOLE... I CREATE QUEST LATER.
 YOU CAN DO WHAT EVER YOU WANT WITH THIS MOD.
 
Please feel free to use without my prior permission. Please credit me if you include it in your own mod.  

Death Scythe console code is wrong in READ ME these are correct codes:

DEATH SCYTHE 33000D6A
MIGHTY BONER 0009B2B2


bugs:

\\\"mighty boner\\\" should be facing down...
I tried to rotate the model 180 degrees in nifskope but it didn\\\'t fix the problem.
there can be more bugs...

major bug appeared. if you drop weapon it hovers in the air and you can\'t take it again... I don\'t know what is causing this... I\'ll try to fix it :/

hovering bug fixed :)


CREDITS:

All credits goes to atte ilola





Jussi138 \\\\,,/
